name: Battle Balls- (Demo Ver.)
description:
HAVE YOU EVER WANTED TO PLAY BEYBLADE BUT ON YOUR PC AND WITH BALLS INSTEAD OF BEYS?

Us too.

Introducing the NEXT EVOLUTION of video gaming; Battle Balls. Test your mettle against other players, battling to see who will be crowned king of the balls. Strike (s)phere into the hearts of your opponents as you spin your way to victory. But be careful, and be sure to ovoid the enemy weapons.

This is the demo version of our game, and was partially inspired by Beyblade and ROUNDS.

Lead Programming, Audio Design, Game Design - sakiskid

Programming, Visual Design, Game Design - kealmcking

Special thanks to birdjohn1 for lots of gameplay and physics advice
